meanings.definition: A type of bacteria that are spiral-shaped and can cause diseases in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The spirochaetes found in the water can make people sick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying how spirochaetes affect different species.
meanings.sent3: The spirochaetes threw a party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: The spirochaetes twisted like tiny dancers under the microscope.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the spirochaetes lurking in the shadows of the forest.
